title: The new boarder design look like a complete downgrade
body:
Seriously Riot?..... Who designed/drew this?...

http://i.imgur.com/6INAISp.png

And lets compare it to this...

http://i.imgur.com/TRiMl3C.jpg

Notice the difference? our older boarders are completly more detailed, more colourful, and more shinier, and this was the only reason why I have played ranked so much just to get a boarder for the loading screen. Now I feel like its not much value to care for anymore

replies.body:
Hey all!

Just to disseminate some information for all concerned in this thread:

From RiotSocrates:

> These are placeholder assets to test reward distribution on pbe and not final art.

Thanks and apologies if this caused any consternation!
Thank you for the update, hopefully people stop posting about it after reading this. Looking forward to seeing the final art, I'm sure it'll look wonderful!

> [{quoted}](name=Chaotic Sage,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Brs6Bnyw,comment-id=00760000,timestamp=2015-10-22T18:30:26.134+0000)
>
> Thank you for the update, hopefully people stop posting about it after reading this. Looking forward to seeing the final art, I'm sure it'll look wonderful!

As if, there are upvotes to farm! 

We will see these hit the front page at least 3 more times.
Unsure why people are down voting you considering how right you unfortunately are.
Why do they have to change? Can you at least tell us what's wrong with the old borders?  Once again this seems like something changing just for the sake of change.  Don't fix what isn't broken...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zwill,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Brs6Bnyw,comment-id=0076,timestamp=2015-10-22T18:28:33.641+0000)
>
> Hey all!
> 
> Just to disseminate some information for all concerned in this thread:
> 
> From RiotSocrates:
> 
> Thanks and apologies if this caused any consternation!

Um...why release shitty placeholder art to test distribution? Why not release the real art?

If the real art isn't ready, why release anything at all?

WTF are you up to Riot?

Absolutely horrible lol.
And the division markers on the side make it look even worse. Really disappointing.
It's also really weird. The more dots you have, the lower your division, but more dots make it seem fancier and better. Without dots would be preferable anyway but this is just ugh.
I thought they were going to ditch those division markers! They look insultingly bad next to the sleek design of the rest of boarder.

Hijacking the comment so its seen....

"These are placeholder assets to test reward distribution on pbe and not final art." - riotsocrates

source: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3ppgkc/the_new_ranked_borders_are_horrible_and_theyre/cw8jnz3
Oh yeah. I want to be unranked now.
Same I like blue..
Hahaha Bronze gets a border now! XD

Bronze doesn't get a border.

It's Blue Side, Red Side, Silver, Gold, Plat, Diamond, Master, Challenger
Oh :(
Why do they even need to change it?  It's like the new Google logo.... just changing for the sake of changing, but not really adding any value.
While I agree with you, technically there WAS a reason for the new Google logo; it's much easier to render.

Jesus Christ how horrifying.

The new ones look so... flat.

> [{quoted}](name=KING OF MASKS,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Brs6Bnyw,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-10-21T23:19:49.575+0000)
>
> Jesus Christ how horrifying.
> 
> The new ones look so... flat.

yep
Riot calls this an update?

I'm not liking how bland they look. I'd much prefer to keep the old borders - there isn't anything wrong with them.  Riot, please stop trying to fix what isn't broken, because there are actual broken things that still need fixing.
its riot after they do something they always down grade just look at everything they have done in the past its a pretty clear cut road

> [{quoted}](name=Genuwhine,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Brs6Bnyw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-21T22:00:39.159+0000)
>
> its riot after they do something they always down grade just look at everything they have done in the past its a pretty clear cut road

This is actually spot on, kats base splash is a good example of this as well.

> kats base splash is a good example of this as well.

And Ahri's.

I really dont get these complaints...

New Ahri:
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CQsSHfRYYhU/VJIojxRmu3I/AAAAAAAAgPI/ZgLcMSZxDcg/s1600/AhriLoadScreen.png
Old Ahri:
http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2012/255/b/7/ahri_splash_art_by_aveldine-d5ej1ds.jpg

I mean its obvious to see which one has more detail put into it and fits ahri's style, its the same with new vs old katarina.

New Kat:
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20150219221522/leagueoflegends/images/9/97/Katarina_OriginalSkin.jpg
(Yes, I am aware it looks really awkward perspective wise)
Old Kat:
http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1413281900338/OriginalKatarina.jpg

I really want to know why you would prefer these splashes? 
Old kat was legitimately being Raiden from Mortal Kombat
Old Ahri was basically ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ in the jungle. 
These two new splashes bring emphasis on the champion and dont let them blend in with the background IMO.
Detailed doesn't mean the same thing as appealing.  The original Ahri splash looked so much better in every way except quality.  That's it.  Quality is the only thing it beats the original with.
The dots on the sides are ugly to be absolutely frank and I think that the borders have become a lot simpler over time. It is not something to be proud of anymore when you barely notice it.
The new one looks like Yu-Gi-Oh cards

At first, I was disappointed about not escaping bronze this season.

But then I saw the loading screen borders... You know, Bronze is actually not so bad, the more you think about it.
debating tanking to bronze just cause of these...yeah they are that bad
There are sooooo many cool loading screen ideas and they do this :(
Agreed
*suddenly doesn't want to hit plat because of how gross that green for the border looks*
Also its dumb that the higher rank you are... the less little dots you get, like wtf?
I mean....would it make sense to get more the higher you get? Yeah let's get 5 dots for for Diamond 1 and 1 dot for Diamond 5.
Maybe it's still WIP?

> [{quoted}](name=TurquoiseYoshi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Brs6Bnyw,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-10-21T22:43:39.287+0000)
>
> Maybe it's still WIP?

yeah but what if they are actually going to release that live thinking we are completely fine with it? I can at least give out the opinion as to why I dont like it. Just like the splash arts on Ahri and katarina that riot has changed due to the playerbase complaining about it as well
I'm just trying to be positive. Let's hope they see this post and either tell us if the borders are permanent or not.
Wow, it's like they got ironed down. Just like how all latest icons like Google Chrome & Windows 8 was.
I for one welcome the change. They look cleaner.

New Master and Challenger look overall better than the current Challenger border, but that's about it.

I just prefer having the "light" effects on the plat and diamond borders we have right now. Gives it life. The others are meh. 

For the new ones, the random dots on the side aren't actually that bad, but why do Master/Challenger lose them? ._. that's so confusing
It's the damned division markers. Wouldn't be a problem if they mentioned them at the start of the season. Hold them off till next season, don't blindside people with this shit.

When they mentioned what the Ranked Rewards would be they posted that the boarders would have indicators for what division you were in. People mentioned not wanting it then and they said they'd talk about taking them out. Guess talks didn't go the way the players wanted.
I meant announce them at season start, not one month before the season ends. They still gave you no time relative to the entire season.

Already mentioned this in another thread but yeah, holy smokes is this a downgrade. If they insist on keeping the division markers, it still looks way better on the old borders.

http://i.imgur.com/zaGQvyw.png

I'll be super disappointed if these "improved" ones make it to live. If the markers have to stay, at least just put them on the old ones.
Crappy looking. Diamond isn't even worth getting now lol.
how about make diamond border look like a diamond border? make it nice and shiny thats what i wanna see
The, ah, little circle dots on each side were an... interesting idea.
The dots look really out of place on the border. I'd rather them be removed and just keep the base.

Not even sure why they're insisting on keeping the division + tier change. Most people I've talked to don't want they fact that they're not "1" in whatever rank advertised, and it can honestly make you feel shitty about what should be an accomplishment. And I've seen quite a few people harassed for being "5" in their division. All the way from Silver to Diamond. I'll actually send in a ticket to player support requesting to just not have a border this season if things stay this way. Definitely an all around fail.
